name: splendid-blog
description: Uses ReactJS and Express for NodeJS to create a dynamic blog website

scripts.create:infrastructure: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name splendidblog --template-body file://./infrastructure/aws.json --profile splendid-blog
scripts.create:lambda-instance: claudia create --handler lambda.handler --timeout 20 --deploy-proxy-api --region us-east-2 --no-optional-dependencies --role splendid-blog-lambda --profile splendid-blog --version production --set-env-from-json .env.production.json
scripts.build:infrastructure: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name splendidblog --template-body file://./infrastructure/aws.json --profile splendid-blog
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:client && npm run deploy
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:client && NODE_ENV=production npm run server

author: Timothy Mathison
